title: Giant, Liv, and Cadex Launch New Time Trial Bikes and Wheels Ahead of 2025 WorldTour Season
content:
The Giant Trinity Advanced SL and Liv Avow time trial bikes, and Cadex Max Aero Disc and Aero 4-Spoke wheels mark a faster set up for Team Jayco AlUla and Liv AlUla Jayco.

Read the full article at Giant, Liv, and Cadex Launch New Time Trial Bikes and Wheels Ahead of 2025 WorldTour Season on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
